title: Nominal GDP grows faster than real, PL increasing

content.prompt: If real gross domestic product is increasing at 3 percent per year and nominal gross domestic product is increasing at 7 percent per year, which of the following is necessarily true?

choices.label: The government is running a budget deficit.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
